Title: Relev√©s
Plot: After Georgia Madchen dies in an explosion, Will asserts that the copy cat killer is still alive. The BAU team links Abigail to the Minnesota Shrike victims and plan to arrest her only to find Will has checked her out of the hospital. Will's hallucinations intensify, causing him to lose Abigail in Minnesota. Meanwhile, Hannibal's subtle manipulation convinces Jack that Will is capable of murder. Hannibal makes an astonishing admission to Abigail.
GuestStars: Gillian Anderson, Scott Thompson, Aaron Abrams, Kacey Rohl, Lara Jean Chorostecki, Ellen Muth
